name: docs2llm
title: Docs2llm
description: Convert documents to and from LLM-friendly formats. PDF, DOCX, images, URLs — to Markdown, JSON, YAML. Export Markdown to Word, PowerPoint, HTML. Rich text clipboard support.
author: ignataleinikov

commands.name: convert-file
commands.title: Convert File
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Pick a file and convert — auto-detects inbound (to Markdown) or outbound (to Word/PowerPoint/HTML)

preferences.name: defaultFormat
preferences.title: Default Inbound Format
preferences.description: Default format when converting files to LLM-friendly output

preferences.name: defaultExportFormat
preferences.title: Default Export Format
preferences.description: Default format when exporting Markdown via Pandoc

commands.name: convert-clipboard
commands.title: Convert Clipboard
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Detect clipboard content (HTML, URL, file, text) and convert bidirectionally

preferences.name: defaultFormat
preferences.title: Default Inbound Format
preferences.description: Default format when converting clipboard to LLM-friendly output

preferences.name: defaultExportFormat
preferences.title: Default Export Format
preferences.description: Default format when exporting Markdown via Pandoc

commands.name: quick-convert
commands.title: Quick Convert
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert the selected Finder file — pre-filled form with bidirectional support

preferences.name: defaultFormat
preferences.title: Default Inbound Format
preferences.description: Default format when converting files to LLM-friendly output

preferences.name: defaultExportFormat
preferences.title: Default Export Format
preferences.description: Default format when exporting Markdown via Pandoc

commands.name: smart-copy
commands.title: Smart Copy
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Auto-detect source (Finder file, selection, clipboard) and convert to clipboard

commands.name: smart-paste

commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert clipboard content and paste into active app or save to Finder folder

commands.name: smart-save
commands.title: Smart Save
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
